Complete the following steps:  

1. Look at the sampling design section of the technical manual for
   your dataset. In no more than two paragraphs, describe the sampling
   procedure used.
2. In one paragraph, describe possible drawbacks of this sampling
   procedure for your proposed research. 
3. Based on your reading of the technical manual, describe which
   weights you will use for your sample and why. 
4. Next, describe why you think that these weights are important, and
   what might happen to your estimates should you not use them.
